duties_responsibilities.duty: Diagnose, troubleshoot, adjust, inspect, repair, and replace parts on Pella products while at customer locations.
Complete service jobs on Pella products in the field: replacing glass in windows or doors, installing window shades, blinds, muntins, screens, etc.
Provide customers with helpful information on the care, operation, and maintenance of their Pella products.
Generate and update all service-related paperwork and file folders following a service visit.
Conduct any necessary follow-up service work or communication to bring resolution and Very Satisfied Customer Service Rating from all Customers.
Perform job site walk-thru’s and complete necessary paperwork, identifying items that need attention or correction prior to project finalization.
Load service van with all necessary parts and equipment, ensuring it stays in safe, working order.
Complete service work orders and communicate any ongoing customer or product related issues with CSR’s.
Work safely and serve as a Customer Service Champion at all times.
Communicate effectively with customers and serve as a professional Pella representative on all assigned job-sites.
Be fully knowledgeable on window and door repair and service aspects of residential construction, and have the ability to take and record accurate measurements.
Have technical expertise to perform job site inspection to assess conditions for repair and service, and be familiar enough with computers to develop proficient knowledge of our service system.

education_certification.credential: Technical degree or certification in mechanical, electrical, or construction-related field (preferred)
